pullRequest.title: Issue #7631: Update doc for WhitespaceAfter
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #7631: add code examples

Ouput of default example:
$ cat config.xml 
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE module PUBLIC
          "-//Puppy Crawl//DTD Check Configuration 1.3//EN"
          "https://checkstyle.org/dtds/configuration_1_3.dtd">
<module name="Checker">
  <module name="TreeWalker">
   <module name="WhitespaceAfter"/>
  </module>
</module>

$ cat Test.java 
public class Test {

  public void myTest() {
      if (foo) {              // OK
          //...
      } else if(bar) {        // violation
          //...
      }

      testMethod(foo, bar);   // OK
      testMethod(foo,bar);    // violation

      for (;;){}               // OK
      for(;;){}                // violation, space after 'for' is required
  }

}

$ java -jar /var/tmp/checkstyle-8.29-all.jar -c config.xml Test.java 
Starting audit...
[ERROR] /var/tmp/Test.java:6:14: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. [WhitespaceAfter]
[ERROR] /var/tmp/Test.java:11:21: ',' is not followed by whitespace. [WhitespaceAfter]
[ERROR] /var/tmp/Test.java:14:7: 'for' is not followed by whitespace. [WhitespaceAfter]
Audit done.
Checkstyle ends with 3 errors.

output of non-default example:
$ cat config.xml 
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE module PUBLIC
          "-//Puppy Crawl//DTD Check Configuration 1.3//EN"
          "https://checkstyle.org/dtds/configuration_1_3.dtd">
<module name="Checker">
  <module name="TreeWalker">
    <module name="WhitespaceAfter">
      <property name="tokens" value="COMMA, SEMI"/>
    </module>
  </module>
</module>

$ cat Test.java 
public class Test {

  public void myTest() {
      int a; int b;           // OK
      int a;int b;            // violation

      testMethod(foo, bar);   // OK
      testMethod(foo,bar);    // violation

      for(;;) {} // OK
  }

}

$ java -jar /var/tmp/checkstyle-8.29-all.jar -c config.xml Test.java 
Starting audit...
[ERROR] /var/tmp/Test.java:5:12: ';' is not followed by whitespace. [WhitespaceAfter]
[ERROR] /var/tmp/Test.java:8:21: ',' is not followed by whitespace. [WhitespaceAfter]
Audit done.
Checkstyle ends with 2 errors.

nodes.bodyText: Remove text after "ok" or " violation" in this and other lines. On exact code there is no "if".

Please add example of behavior on default config.
Please share CLI output of config and example code to prove that Check is actually behave like shown in your example

Please remove class definition, the less  unnecessary code in example the better.
Your code is not compilable, so extra code does no good.
Do you know why this is ok ? If this is big it it is better to not put it in example.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -62,6 +62,23 @@ * 
  * <module name="WhitespaceAfter"/>
  *
+ *

Example:

+ * 
+ * public class MyTest {
+ *  public static void myTest() {
+ *      if (foo) {              // OK
+ *              //...
+ *      } else if(bar) {        // violation
+ *              //...
+ *      }
+ *
+ *      testMethod(foo, bar);   // OK
+ *      testMethod(foo,bar);    // violation
+ *
+ *      for(;;){}               // OK
